bill.title: Public resources.
bill.description: An act to amend Sections 1602, 1609, 1610, 1613, 1615, 2942, 12157, and 12159.5 of, and to add Sections 2081.2, 4502.5, and 12008.1 to, the Fish and Game Code, to repeal and add Section 52334 of the Food and Agricultural Code, to amend Sections 8670.48.3 and 12812.2 of the Government Code, to amend Sections 25150.7, 25150.84, 25189.3, 25205.7, 25205.18, 25205.19, 25247, 100829, 100860.1, 100862, 105206, 116590, and 116681 of, and to add Sections 25253.5 and 43011.3 to, the Health and Safety Code, to amend Sections 10187.5 and 10190 of the Public Contract Code, to amend Sections 4629.6 and 4629.8 of, to amend, repeal, and add Section 21191 of, to add Chapter 6.5 (commencing with Section 25550) to Division 15 of, and to repeal the heading of Chapter 6.5 (commencing with Section 25550) of Division 15 of, the Public Resources Code, to amend Sections 43053 and 43152.10 of the Revenue and Taxation Code, to amend, repeal, and add Sections 5106 and 5108 of the Vehicle Code, to amend Sections 1430, 1440, and 13205 of, and to add and repeal Section 79717 of, the Water Code, to amend Section 258 of the Welfare and Institutions Code, and to amend Section 11 of Chapter 2 of the Statutes of 2009 of the Seventh Extraordinary Session, relating to public resources, and making an appropriation therefor, to take effect immediately, bill related to the budget.

history.action: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From printer. May be acted upon on or after February 7.
Referred to Com. on B. & F.R.
Withdrawn from committee. Ordered to second reading.
Read second time. Ordered to third reading.
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 25. Noes 11. Page 3540.) Ordered to the Assembly.
In Assembly. Read first time. Held at Desk.
From committee with author's amendments. Read second time and amended. Re-referred to Com. on BUDGET.
From committee with author's amendments. Read second time and amended. Re-referred to Com. on BUDGET.
Assembly Rule 96 suspended. (Ayes 50. Noes 25. Page 5358.) Withdrawn from committee. Ordered to third reading. Assembly Rule 63 suspended. (Ayes 50. Noes 25. Page 5358.)
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 48. Noes 28. Page 5391.) Ordered to the Senate.
In Senate. Concurrence in Assembly amendments pending.
Assembly amendments concurred in. (Ayes 26. Noes 13. Page 5441.) Ordered to engrossing and enrolling.
Enrolled and presented to the Governor at 5 p.m.
Chaptered by Secretary of State. Chapter 340, Statutes of 2016.

votes.desc: Senate 3rd Reading SB839 Committee On B. & F.R. (Leno)
